{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3538763,"name":"Marcelino Chua","username":"Marcelino","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/a9adbd/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-24T22:51:32.067Z","cooked":"

Hi Folks,

We just received our VH113 today!

Is there specific firmware that we should download for VH113 in AP mode?

Or do we just use the same one that converts the VH109 to VH113? Found here?

Thanks!
Marcelino

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-02-24T22:51:32.067Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":11,"reads":88,"readers_count":87,"score":72.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":493044,"topic_slug":"vh113-firmware","display_username":"Marcelino Chua","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net/access-points/fms-ap-firmware-releases","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":16}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":73640,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/vh113-firmware/493044/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3538871,"name":"Joseph Walters","username":"Jwal","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jwal/{size}/228161_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-25T00:58:25.792Z","cooked":"

Your link is correct: you use AP offseason or AP Practice depending on what features you want/your setup.

AP offseason if you have a Cisco managed switch and are running cheesy arena or full FMS.

AP Practice if you have an 802.1q managed switch and want the vh-113 to act as the DHCP server. No FMS but pretty decent/manageable multi-bot access configuration
